title: Billionaire Les Wexner tells US lawmakers he was 'naive' and 'conned' by Epstein
summary_full: Testifying before Congress, the former CEO of Victoria's Secret lingerie brand accused Epstein of stealing "vast sums" of money from his family.
summary_public: Testifying before Congress, the former CEO of Victoria's Secret lingerie brand accused Epstein of stealing "vast sums" of money from his family.
